aviso_mailto: By clicking "Send", your email application will open to complete the submission.
contacto_subtitulo: I'm ready to help you create a digital presence that stands out. Fill out the form and I'll respond as soon as possible.
cta_parrafo: Turn your idea into reality with a professional web solution.
error_parrafo: We're sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It's possible the address was typed incorrectly or the page no longer exists.
footer_copyright: Â© 2025 Your Name. All rights reserved.
footer_parrafo: Professional web development and design to help you grow.
gracias_parrafo: Thank you for getting in touch. Your message has been successfully received. I'll respond within the next 24-48 business hours.
habilidad_backend_parrafo: Handling databases and server logic with Node.js, Python or PHP.
habilidad_diseno_parrafo: Wireframing, prototyping and visual design for an intuitive user experience.
habilidad_frontend_parrafo: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React or Vue.
hero_subtitulo: I turn ideas into digital experiences that work. I help you create a website that reflects your brand and connects with your customers.
hero_titulo: Hi, I'm Your Name. Web Developer.
portfolio_subtitulo: A collection of my most recent and successful work.
section_servicios_titulo: Services that will help you grow
service_dev_desc: Creation of unique, fast and secure websites optimized for an exceptional user experience.
service_ecommerce_desc: Development of robust and easy-to-manage online stores that convert visitors into customers.
service_seo_desc: I improve your website's visibility so potential clients can find you on Google and other search engines.
servicios_desarrollo_parrafo: We create unique, fast, secure and device-adaptive websites. From landing pages to complex portals, we build the perfect solution for your brand.
servicios_ecommerce_parrafo: We develop online stores optimized for sales. We help you manage products, process payments and offer your customers a smooth and secure shopping experience.
servicios_seo_parrafo: We increase your site's visibility in search engines and improve its performance (loading speed), ensuring your target audience finds you and gets the best possible experience.
servicios_subtitulo: We design and develop custom web solutions to help you achieve your goals.
sobre_mi_historia_parrafo_1: I began my career in the digital world with an insatiable curiosity for how web pages worked. What started as a hobby became a passion and eventually my profession.
sobre_mi_historia_parrafo_2: My philosophy is simple: a good web page should not only be visually appealing but also functional, accessible, and most importantly, solve a problem for the user. I specialize in translating complex ideas into simple and effective digital solutions.
sobre_mi_subtitulo: Web Designer and Developer passionate about creating amazing digital experiences.
